body.p: This Interpretation applies to the following types of non‑reciprocal distributions of assets by an entity to its owners acting in their capacity as owners:

li.p: distributions of non‑cash assets (eg items of property, plant and equipment, businesses as defined in IFRS 3, ownership interests in another entity or disposal groups as defined in IFRS 5); and
distributions that give owners a choice of receiving either non‑cash assets or a cash alternative.
